args.natural_language_statement: In any Hausdorff space, every compact set is closed.

retrieved_examples.nl: Every continuous image of a compact set is compact.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

theorem continuous_on.compact_image {α β : Type*} [TopologicalSpace α] [TopologicalSpace β] {f : α → β} (hf : Continuous f) {s : Set α} (hs : IsCompact s) : IsCompact (f '' s) := by sorry
